root.name: 10 Pin Bowling
root.description: Overview10-Pin Bowling is a bowling game for the Game Boy Color released in 1999. 10-Pin Bowling was developed by Morning Star Multimedia and published by Majesco Entertainment. 10-Pin Bowling features both single player and two player modes. In the two player mode players take their turns using the same Gameboy.GameplayThe Gameplay Screen10-Pin Bowling is a very simple representation of a bowling game. The only options are single or two player, rumble on or off, and a name input. The mechanics of the bowling include setting the position on the floor of the bowler, setting the curve, then holding the A button to set the power.
